populateCatalog.createSQL: CREATE TABLE solrtemp1.TI_BRAND_DEALER_0 (BRAND_KEY BIGINT NOT NULL, BRAND_CONF VARCHAR(10480),authedBrand VARCHAR(10480),BRAND_SEQUENCE DOUBLE(10,2), PRIMARY KEY(BRAND_KEY));
populateCatalog.querySQL: SELECT brand.BRAND_KEY, COALESCE(GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT BRANDCONF.DEALER_ID,'-',BRANDCONF.CONF_ID,':',BRANDCONF.CONF_VALUE  SEPARATOR '|' ),'') AS BRAND_CONF,GROUP_CONCAT( DISTINCT authed_brand.sales_area_id,'_',authed_brand.status SEPARATOR ';') as authedBrand,COALESCE(brand.SEQUENCE,0) AS BRAND_SEQUENCE  FROM mdmdb2.brand brand JOIN manufacturer.authed_brand authed_brand ON authed_brand.brand_id=brand.BRAND_ID LEFT JOIN mdmdb2.BRANDCONF BRANDCONF ON brand.BRAND_KEY = BRANDCONF.BRAND_KEY WHERE COALESCE(brand.ISDELETE,0)=0 AND COALESCE(brand.ISLOCK,0)=0 AND brand.STATE='A' GROUP BY brand.BRAND_KEY;

populateCatalog.createSQL: CREATE TABLE solrtemp1.TI_BRANDCATGRPREL_0 (BRAND_KEY BIGINT NOT NULL, CATGROUPS VARCHAR(10000), PRIMARY KEY(BRAND_KEY));
populateCatalog.querySQL: SELECT BRANDCATGRPREL.BRAND_KEY, TI_CATGROUP_PATH.CATGROUPS FROM mdmdb2.BRANDCATGRPREL BRANDCATGRPREL, solrtemp1.TI_CATGROUP_PATH_0 TI_CATGROUP_PATH, mdmdb2.CATGRPOPTREL  where BRANDCATGRPREL.CATGROUP_KEY = CATGRPOPTREL.REL_CATGROUP_KEY AND CATGRPOPTREL.CATGROUP_KEY = TI_CATGROUP_PATH.CATGROUP_KEY GROUP BY BRANDCATGRPREL.BRAND_KEY;
